telegram_default_department_description: All Telegram users will be transferred to this omnichannel department
telegram_service_unavailable_message_des: This message will be sent to user if some error occurs like if no agents are online
telegram_welcome_message_description: This message will be sent to visitor, when they send their first message
telegram_agents_display_name_description: This agent info would be appended in front of every message sent by agent to visitor
Name: Name
telegram_file_upload_max_size_message_de: Set it to -1 to remove the file size limitation.
telegram_media_type_whitelist_message_de: Comma-separated list of media types. Leave it blank for accepting all media types.
